title: My google search bar no longer shows my search history
content:
Recently my google search bar behavior has changed, I don't believe I changed anything.  For a while, I would see what looked like strange search history, but found out that was 'trending' setting and I turned that off.  Now I don't see trending searches, I see no search history at all.  If I open Chrome, I see search history as expected.
Any help in getting the search history back on my google search bar would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
